website_summaries.verdict: This fiberglass board is long enough for beginners of a variety of weights, and it’s durable enough to last for years.
pros: For a skimboard that is great to learn on but offers a design equipped for more advanced skimming, this is the best option
long, this board can accommodate many riders, and its fiberglass laminate is highly durable
The foam is lightweight, making this a good board for riding waves or skimming on the shore
cons: While this is a skimboard built to last, it is far more expensive than most wooden boards

customer_reviews.title: Easy to nosedive if your weight is a little too far forward
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this board, he has ridden it many times in the last few days and loved it. The board has very good float even in deep water. Good fishtails ,180s, 360s and sand skimming. Board has a good amount of control and my son is yet to get the wave riding down but other than that it is a great product. There were a few flaws on the board and traction. The deck grip is slightly crooked and they grinned too much fiberglass off the side and you can see the foam but it does not effect the board’s preformance. Overall a great board. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Board
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. As a 105 pound kid. This board holds me and my older brother, who weighs over 150, perfectly. This really is a great quality board!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Light weight yet very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this skimboard for our granddaughter and she just loves it! Not heavy like the wooden epoxy coated boards so retrieval is easier. I would definitely recommend this to our friends. There was a slight hiccup with the shipper but Slapfish customer service was stellar and problem was resolved quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality way better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I love this board. The make feels strong and it rides buttery smooth even when I was skimming it pretty cruddy sand conditions. I love the artistic attention to detail, even of the stomp pad their is a detail of a fish that really made the design a peace of art. The preview pictures really don't do this board justice. Great to see some unique skim brands, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gjanu

customer_reviews.title: 13yr old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son was using a wood one and loves this lightweight fiberglass one - 5 stars in his book!!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Shore

customer_reviews.title: Son love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 15 year old son for Christmas. He is 140 lbs and it works great for him. He like the grip on it. He has not had a chance to use it much yet but so far he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal C. Modlin

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas present for my younger son, so he hasn't seen it yet. However, my older son, saw it and said it was, "sweet." So I am taking that as my younger son will like it. His favorite color is green. I'm not sure of the transition grips. I thought they were optional to put on. But, it looks like where he puts his feet. So we will see.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: High End Skim Board
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my son's 15th birthday. He was very happy with it. Shipping was fast and the product was packed very carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Brooke Halterman

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12 year old son who loves it. Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Audra L Britton

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Amazing customer service.... the very best. Will recommend Slapfish every single time.
customer_reviews.author: K B

customer_reviews.title: This board is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered a board and I am 100% satisfied! The packaging was awesome and got to my house quick. The board is lightweight and very smooth I will be sure to buy more products from slap skimboards in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Shelton

product_meta.title: Slapfish Skimboards - Fiberglass & Carbon - Riders up to 200 lbs - 48" with Traction Deck Grip - Kids & Adults - 4 Colors
product_meta.description: SIZE: 48" for riders up to 200 lbs. The board length should reach the top of the riders rib cage (within 1-2 inches) for the right balance and center of gravity. PROFESSIONALLY INSTALLED TRACTION PAD: 3M guidelines specify that your pad should sit for 24 hours to allow the adhesive to release enough to truly stick for the long haul. That can be a long wait when you are ready to hit the beach. Let us handle that for you! Our pros will prep the surface, snap a chalk line dead center and place the pad for you. By the time it arrives you're good to go! TOP GRADE COMPSITES - American made Poly PVC core will never gas out or delaminate like an EPS (styrofoam) core. Interlocking fiberglass mat, plus nose and tail carbon fiber reinforcement, will fuse to that core with high quality ultra clear gloss resin, creating a seal with unmatched durability. Water tight and solidly sealed. STRONG AND LIGHT - Under 5 pounds this board is light to carry and light to glide across the water. The 21" wide deck allows for an comfortable arm span. Together these set you up to focus on picking your wave, running and sliding with nothing to weigh you down. Fluid motion and smooth performance. TRIED AND TESTED - This board has been tried and tested in all conditions and as performed true to promise.OFFERINGS: First quality boards, and on occasion, factory blems. A blemished board has a minor cosmetic imperfection or has been used very lightly. Our standards are high so many of these are truly minor flaws.
feature_bullets: DETAILS: 48” length; 2” Nose Rocker; 7/8” Tail Rocker; average board weight is 3-4 lbs; Rider Weight Limit – up to 200 lbs. Height - 5' 2" & up. Professionally installed traction pad included. 20” arch bar optional.

FEATURES: Polished deck, ultra-glide bottom. Perfect sweet spot for long rides and fast motion. The right amount of rocker to avoid getting caught in the lip of the wave, yet not slow you down. Slapfish traction is a closed cell, fully sealed EVA grip secured with 3M waterproof adhesive.

DURABILITY: Handcrafted with precision. This Slapfish board is fiberglass. Carbon reinforced at the nose and tail. Double reinforced at the rails. The Poly PVC foam core is supremely light weight, structurally dense, impact/fracture rated beyond the board weight limit and is waterproof. This is NOT a EPS (styrofoam) core which will gas out and delaminate over time. No fear of delamination or separation – ever.

PERFORMANCE: Sand sliding and wave riding from beginner to experienced. Consciously tapered for balance and support of varied stances. Unlimited skim potential! Light weight. Floaty enough to support a wide range of riders. Performs in all wave conditions from mush to surging swell. Long liners, smooth wave wraps, 360 spins and more.
OFFERINGS: First quality boards, and on occasion, factory blems. A blemished board has a minor cosmetic imperfection. Our standards are high so many of these are truly minor flaws.
